content: the woodland men s scarf is an exquisite accessory that seamlessly blends comfort and fashion making it the perfect accessory for both casual and formal attire the even moss stitch creates a simple yet visually appealing texture that provides protection against the cold winter wind crochet the scarf in a soft cozy worsted weight yarn for a statement piece that will surely become your favorite guy s go-to accessory of the season **yarn** lion brand heartland a beautiful 100% worsted weight acrylic - 2 skeins each of 2 colors - the sample uses mammoth cave and grand canyon - the entire scarf takes approx 13 1oz of yarn 655yd **hook** us size i-9 5 5mm **skill level** confident beginner **stitches used** slip_stitch chain foundation half_double_crochet optional half_double_crochet the even moss stitch is a one row repeat of alternating slip stitches and half_double_crochet the crochet men s scarf has beautiful drape in spite of the rather dense nature of the even moss stitch **finished size** approx 9 x 76 **construction** the crochet men s scarf is worked lengthwise creating a striped effect with the surface texture that pairs nicely with the stripes worked with the color changes
